## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G21900](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G21900)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RAD7c</u>
- **Gene Name:** Radiation sensitive 7c
- **Description:**   RNI-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT5G21900.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G21900.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT5G21900.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G21900.2)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [rad7c-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Significantly increased UV sensitivity in roots, hypocotyls, and adult leaves.
## Literature:
